## ü§ñ AI Industry Snapshot - 2025-11-10

### Top AI Stories

1. [Nvidia CEO SHOCKS Everyone: ‚ÄúChina Will WIN The AI Race!‚Äù](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LPpbAujagdM)

2. [What Is an AI Stack? LLMs, RAG, & AI Hardware](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RRKwmeyIc24)

3. [Google Launches FREE AI Course (With Certificate & Swags!)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1tlDCW42Bag)

4. [Are LLMs The Key To Achieving AGI? - AI and Machine Learning Explained](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FHOLyZamPjA)

5. [What Makes LLM Deployment So Complex? - AI and Machine Learning Explained](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-EPtvuRKcGY)

6. [Experiments in LLMs ‚Äì Everything I've learned (so far) ‚Äì Part One ‚Äì Fine tuning](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36381832)

7. [Experiments in LLMs ‚Äì OpenAI Functions](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36534635)

8. [Experiments in LLMs ‚Äì Vector DBs and Embeddings](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36447740)

9. [Show HN: AI-Powered Twitter Filter](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39210964)

10. [Show HN: AI/ML Weekly Digest ‚Äì Curated by LLM, Summarized and Sentiment-Analyzed](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37954932)

### AI Trends Summary

1. Nvidia's CEO has made a startling statement, suggesting that China is poised to lead in the AI race, indicating a significant shift in global AI dominance expectations.
2. The article demystifies the AI technology stack, explaining the roles of Large Language Models (LLMs), Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and AI hardware in building AI systems.
3. Google has introduced a free AI course, offering participants not only knowledge but also certification and exclusive Google-branded merchandise, aiming to democratize AI education.
4. There's a growing belief that Large Language Models (LLMs) could be a crucial step towards achieving Artificial General Intelligence (AGI), highlighting their importance in the broader AI and machine learning landscape.
5. The complexity of deploying Large Language Models (LLMs) is unpacked, shedding light on the technical and practical challenges that make LLM utilization in real-world applications intricate.

business_news.markdown:
## üíº Business News - 2025-11-10

### Top Stories

1. [Mega Millions jackpot climbs to $900 million](https://www.foxbusiness.com/lifestyle/mega-millions-jackpot-climbs-900-million)

2. [Treasury Secretary Bessent warns shutdown could slash quarterly economic growth by half](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/treasury-secretary-bessent-warns-shutdown-could-slash-quarterly-economic-growth-half)

3. [FOX Business special explores how socialism's rise threatens America‚Äôs prosperity after Mamdani win](https://www.foxbusiness.com/media/experts-warn-socialisms-rise-threatens-americas-prosperity-future-nation-stands-crossroads)

4. [Trump calls tariff opponents 'fools,' promises $2K dividend payments for Americans](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/trump-calls-tariff-opponents-fools-promises-2000-dividend-payments-americans)

5. [Ellen Barkin's former New York City townhouse listed for $23M after renovation](https://www.foxbusiness.com/fox-news-entertainment/ellen-barkins-former-new-york-city-townhouse-listed-23m-after-renovation)

6. [Honda issues recall for 400K Civics after finding wheels 'may detach from vehicle'](https://www.foxbusiness.com/economy/honda-issues-recall-400k-civics-after-finding-wheels-may-detach-from-vehicle)

7. [Trump doubles down on the economy despite a strong rebuke from voters](https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/donald-trump/trump-economy-strong-rebuke-voters-rcna242686)

8. [Infant Formula Recalled Amid Botulism Investigation](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/11/09/health/infant-formula-botulism-byheart.html)

9. [Trump Officials Push States to ‚ÄòUndo‚Äô Work to Send Full SNAP Benefits](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/11/09/business/trump-administration-states-undo-full-snap-food-stamps.html)

10. [Flight Cancellations and Delays May Get Worse This Week Amid Shutdown](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/11/09/business/airport-flights-cancellations.html)

### Summary

The Mega Millions jackpot has soared to a staggering $900 million, capturing widespread attention. Meanwhile, Treasury Secretary Bessent has raised alarms that a government shutdown could severely impact the economy, potentially halving quarterly economic growth. FOX Business is delving into concerns over socialism's growing influence in America, particularly following Mamdani's victory, suggesting a threat to the nation's economic prosperity. In the political realm, former President Trump has vehemently defended tariffs, promising Americans $2,000 dividend payments, and showcasing his distinctive economic approach. On a different note, the luxury real estate market is buzzing with news of Ellen Barkin's exquisitely renovated New York City townhouse, now on the market for $23 million, highlighting the enduring allure and value of high-end properties.

tech_news.markdown:
## üíª Tech News - 2025-11-10

### Top Stories

1. [Dissecting the Syscall Instruction: Kernel Entry and Exit Mechanisms](https://howtech.substack.com/p/dissecting-the-syscall-instruction)

2. [Show HN: UnisonDB ‚Äì Replicates like a message bus. Acts like a database](https://github.com/ankur-anand/unisondb)

3. [Is the Moon Worth Mining?](https://nautil.us/is-the-moon-worth-mining-1246663/)

4. [How the UK Lost Its Shipbuilding Industry](https://www.construction-physics.com/p/how-the-uk-lost-its-shipbuilding)

5. [Show HN: Fleet Fund ‚Äì Invest fractionally in EV chargers that earn income](https://fleet-fund.vercel.app)

6. [Show HN: CalmNest ‚Äì Helping you put your phone down and fall asleep](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45871235)

7. [End of The Line: how Saudi Arabia's Neom dream unravelled](https://www.ft.com/register/access)

8. [When rivers swallow land: Bangladesh's endless battle with erosion](https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/cop/when-rivers-swallow-land-bangladeshs-endless-battle-with-erosion-2025-11-10/)

9. [Palantir CEO on "The Axios Show"](https://www.axios.com/2025/11/07/palantir-ceo-alex-karp-interview-axios)

10. [Globalstar draws SpaceX interest in sale process](https://www.reuters.com/business/media-telecom/globalstar-draws-spacex-interest-sale-process-bloomberg-news-reports-2025-10-30/)

### Summary

1. The article explores the inner workings of the syscall instruction, focusing on how it facilitates communication between user space and kernel space, detailing the mechanisms that manage entry and exit to the kernel during system calls.

2. UnisonDB is introduced as a novel technology that combines the replication capabilities of a message bus with the functionality of a database, aiming to enhance data synchronization and management in distributed systems.

3. The viability of lunar mining is examined, considering the potential benefits against the technological, economic, and logistical challenges of extracting resources from the Moon for use on Earth and beyond.

4. This piece reflects on the decline of the UK's shipbuilding industry, analyzing the historical, economic, and political factors that contributed to its downfall from a position of global dominance.

5. Fleet Fund presents an innovative investment opportunity, allowing individuals to invest fractionally in electric vehicle (EV) chargers, which generate income, highlighting a growing trend towards sustainable and income-generating green investments.
